name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程的主旨在針對兒童文學與青少年文學的經典之作，給予學生閱讀與分析上的訓練，並培養學生對不同文學主題和寫作風格的鑑賞能力。此外，本課程亦針對兒童文學與青少年文學在現今文化產業的應用作一巡禮，進而引領學生作文化創意表現。The purpose of this course is to guide our students to ”read into” the cultural products known as ”Children's Literature” and ”Teenager's Literature” and to appreciate and analyze their implications for the readers today so as to inspire our students to be more original and creative in their own works.
schedule:
Topic One:  Fairy Tales and Folklores
Week 1  Peter Rabbits by Beatrix Potter
Week 2  The tales from the Grimm Brothers and Anderson
Week 3  Walt Disney's adaptation of children's literature
--------Peter and the Wolf; Pocahontas; The Little Mermaid;
--------Lacy and I; Pinochio;  The Lion King
Topic Two: Literature of Growth and Adventures
Week 4  Harry Potter by J. k. Rowling
Week 5  The Adventures of the Baudelaires; The Whale Rider
Week 6  Stuart Little; Charlotte's Web by E. B. White
Topic Three: Fantasy Literature
Week 7  Lord of the Rings 魔戒
Week 8  Narnia 納尼亞
Week 9  Eragon 龍騎士
Topic Four: Tale's from Miyazaki 宮崎駿
Week 10  Howl's Moving Castle
Week 11  Tales from Earthsea
Week 12  Valley of the Wind
Topic Five:  Tales from Epics and Mythology
Week 13  Beowulf
Week 14  King Arthur and the FIrst Knight
Week 15  Iliad; Oddyssey
Topic Six: Tales from Science Fiction
Week 16  Space Oddyssey 2001
Week 17  Star Wars; Star Trek
Week 18  Presentation of final project
scorePolicy:
1. In class presentation:
---Story-telling: 10%
---Reading picture books: 10%
---5 written reports  on the stories: 5% X 5 = 25%
2. Participation in class:
---Attandance: 5% is deducted from final grade for each absence
---Discussions and answering questions:  15%
3. Final project: 30%
